PR template:

Pull Request Checklist

Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added IF NEEDED (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been reviewed and added / updated if needed (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Lint (via swiftlint) rules have passed, and any fix or update to the rules were made to avoid / fix most warnings
- [ ] Formatter (`swiftformat .` also with [X-SwiftFormat](https://github.com/ruiaureliano/X-SwiftFormat) on file basis) has passed locally and any fixes were made for failures

## Pull Request Type

Please check the type of change your PR introduces:

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Code style update (formatting, renaming)
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
- [ ] Build related changes
- [ ] Documentation content changes
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## What is the current behavior?

Issue Number: [SHAIOS-N]()

## What is the new behavior? (What was introduced / changed)

* ...
* ...
* ...

## Does this introduce a breaking change?

- [ ] Yes
- [ ] No

## Other information

Describe any other useful / related information regarding the PR / issue, add screenshots of feature in relevant devices if any.
